description:
Search out the best lines without sore, sweaty feet. Fine-gauge merino provides warmth without bulk and has natural antimicrobial properties.

  • Made of fine-gauge knit merino wool with nylon and spandex for durability and fit
  • All weather performance for warmth in winter, yet cool enough for spring turns
  • True Seamless™ construction makes them irresistibly comfortable
  • Ultra-thin, cushionless design fits comfortably in snug-fitting ski boots
  • Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep
name: Darn Tough RFL Ultra-Lightweight OTC Socks - Unisex
